DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to study the ease of use of the Polyflux HD-C4 Small dialyzer under conditions of routine clinical use for hemodialysis
DOC.brief_title: Ease of Use Study for the Gambro Polyflux HD-C4 Small Dialyzer
DOC.detailed_description: Market evaluation protocol. This ease of use study involves the use of FDA 510(k) cleared hemodialyzers and will have no impact on the patient's routine dialysis therapy. This study is strictly aimed at obtaining feedback from the nursing and technical staff regarding the use of the Polyflux HD-C4 Small dialyzer. The dialysis nursing staff will complete ease of use assessments following routine dialysis therapy.
DOC.criteria: n/a routine dialysis patients n/a routine dialysis patients
